frozen.name: rubicon-x
frozen.shortDescription: Unofficial forth chapter of the Marathon series
frozen.longDescription: Rubicon X is a free, cross platform, first person shooter that continues the story of Bungieâ€™s Marathon trilogy. First released as Marathon:Rubicon in 2001, Rubicon X is a complete overhaul of the original. It features all new high-resolution artwork, new and updated maps, and enough surprises to feel like a whole new game.
